author: senh
title: A more intimate, upscale way to cruise the Rhine
text: BING NEWS: Photo tour: Inside one of the most elegant ships on the Rhine Unveiled in 2014, Tauck's 130-passenger Inspire is one of the most intimate and upscale river ships sailing in Europe. (Photo: Gene Sloan, USA TODAY) ABOARD THE INSPIRE -- Thinking about a river cruise on the Rhine? When you're in the mood for an intimate dinner for two, you can make reservations at one of the ship's specialty ... 01/15/2014 - 3:08 pm | View Link SeaDream Yacht Club transports passengers to pristine paradises No other cruise line offered such intimate, upscale, almost personal yacht-like experiences with amazing food and a fabulous marina from which passengers could dive off and snorkel, jet ski, swim and just loll in the sea (weather and Captain permitting).
